data.author: Author One
data.description: This is a comprehensive guide for JEE Main preparation.

reviews.comment: Excellent book for JEE Main preparation. The explanations are clear and concise, making it easy to understand complex topics. Highly recommended for all aspirants.
Very helpful and detailed. The practice questions are well-structured and cover all important topics. However, some sections could use more examples.
Good book with clear explanations. It provides a solid foundation for the exam, but I found a few errors in the practice questions. Overall, it's a useful resource.
This book is a must-have for JEE Main aspirants. The detailed solutions and step-by-step approach make it easy to follow. It helped me improve my problem-solving skills significantly.
Very detailed and helpful. The book covers all the necessary topics and provides ample practice questions. Some chapters are a bit lengthy, but overall, it's a great resource.

data.title: Oswaal 164 JEE Main Solved Papers
